relevant_findings.general: No acute distress, alert and oriented, comfortable, ambulating independently.
relevant_findings.respiratory: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no respiratory distress.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, appropriately tender, slight distention, dressings clean, dry, intact.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well-perfused, no cyanosis/clubbing/edema, palpable dorsalis pedis pulses bilaterally.
